item.title: Summer reading
item.description: Robot Proof: Higher Education in the age of Artificial Intelligence Joseph E. Anoun A short but well written glimpse into how higher ed will have to adapt given the progress of artificial intelligence and its impact on human work. Anoun mostly follows Harari on the transition of human work but is more an optimist insofar as he thinks there will still be a role for humans alongside machines in the labour market.
